original: Blide, Karl Johan Herbert, civilingenjör, byggnadschef, stadsingenjör, Västervik, f. 26/1/98 i Forserum, Jönköp. L, av insp. Carl B. o. Emilia Malmberg. G. 29 m. Sonja Ståhlberg. Barn: Bo f. 30. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs real 16, ex. v. CTH (VoV) 20. Res. t. Engl. 24 o. 31, Frankr. 24 o. 31, Ital. 24, Schweiz 24, Tyskl. 24, 25, 31 o. 36, Belg. 31, Danm. o. Norge uppr. ggr. Anst. v. Gbgs stads gatukont. 21-28, v. Jönköp. dito 33-37, byggn :chef o. stadsing. i Västervik sed. 37. Led. av länsvägndn o. vägsynendn, styr :ordf. i stift. Familjebostäder, ordf. i kom-munik:ndn, led. av styr. f. A-B Ly-singsbadet, Västerviks Fastigh. A-B o. Västerviks Kraft A-B. Medl. av Frimurarorden, RotarykL, Sv. komm:-tekii. fören. o. Sv. tekn:fören. m. fl.
translated: Blide, Karl Johan Herbert, civil engineer, construction manager, city engineer, from Västervik, born on January 26, 1898 in Forserum, Jönköping County, son of Inspector Carl B. and Emilia Malmberg. Married to Sonja Ståhlberg in 1929. They have one child, Bo, born in 1930. Blide graduated from Gothenburg Real School 16 and Chalmers University of Technology in 1920. He travelled to England in 1924 and 1931, France in 1924 and 1931, Italy in 1924, Switzerland in 1924, Germany in 1924, 1925, 1931, and 1936, Belgium in 1931, Denmark, and Norway several times. Blide was employed by Gothenburg City Road Administration from 1921-1928 and Jönköping City Road Administration from 1933-1937. He has been construction manager and city engineer in Västervik since 1937. He is a member of the county road board and road inspector, chairman of the foundation family housing, chairman of the communication committee, and a member of the board of Lysingsbadet AB, Västerviks Fastighet AB and Västerviks Kraft AB. Blide is a member of the Freemasons, Rotary Club, Swedish Municipal Engineering Association, Swedish Technical Association, and others.
